Name: _LanguageCode
Comment: Стандартный код языка Windows для данного пакета (может быть только основной код например en или основной-дополнительный код например en-GB)

Name: IDETooltip_LaptopMode_Description
English: In Laptop Mode you can pan, scroll and zoom by moving the mouse over an area\nwhile holding ${LaptopLZoomKey} to zoom and Left Alt to pan and scroll.\nUse ${LaptopRHSKeys} for non-mouse interactions while Laptop Mode is enabled.
Translation: В режиме ноутбука вы можете перемещаться, прокручивать и масштабировать, перемещая курсор мыши над областью,\nудерживая ${LaptopLZoomKey} для увеличения и левый Alt для перемещения и прокрутки.\nИспользуйте ${LaptopRHSKeys} для взаимодействия без мыши при включённом режиме ноутбука.
Comment: Описание для режима ноутбука в ИСР

Name: IDETooltip_LaptopMode_Title
Comment: Заголовок панели инструментов ИСР для режима ноутбука

Name: IDE_FatalErrorWarning
English: GameMaker has become unstable.\nPlease save changes and exit.
Translation: GameMaker работает нестабильно.\nСохраните изменения и выйдите.
Comment: Предупреждение пользователя о том что следует сохранить изменения и выйти

Name: IDE_FolderPermsWarning
Comment: Отсутствие доступа к системным каталогам при запуске

Name: Dialog_CopyToClipboard
Comment: Копировать сообщение диалогового окна в буфер

Name: IDE_SteamVersionInfo
Comment: Информация о версии ИСР при запуске из Steam

Name: UpdateDialogRemindMe
Comment: Диалоговое окно нового обновления: кнопка «напомнить позже»

Name: UpdateDialogLabel
English: New version is available! \nYou are on v{0}\nNew version is {1}
Translation: Доступна новая версия! \nУ вас установлена версия {0}\nНовая версия: {1}
Comment: Диалоговое окно нового обновления: указывает какая версия сейчас и какая версия доступна

Name: UpdateDialogReleaseNotes
Comment: Диалог нового обновления: кнопка для просмотра списка изменений

Name: RSS_Download_Exception
English: Could not reach the RSS feed: {0}
Translation: Could not reach the RSS feed: {0}
Comment: A message which is shown when the RSS feed is not accessible

Name: Dialog_DontShowAgain
Comment: Message next to checkbox to allow the user to choose not to see this popup in future

Name: runtime_modules_window
Comment: A title for a window with runtime modules

Name: Runtime_Installing_Version
Comment: user facing splash screen message for installing runtime

Name: runtime_select_modules
Comment: A label proposing to select modules

Name: ImageEditor_SelectAll
Comment: Image editor select all menu option

Name: TargetSelection_Platform_Test
Comment: the teset platform title in the platform selection list

Name: TargetSelection_Platform_android
Comment: the android platform title in the platform selection list

Name: TargetSelection_Platform_HTML5
Comment: the html5 platform title in the platform selection list

Name: TargetSelection_Platform_Linux
Comment: the linux platform title in the platform selection list

Name: TargetSelection_Platform_operagx
Comment: the opera gx platform title in the platform selection list

Name: TargetSelection_Platform_ps4
Comment: the ps4 platform title in the platform selection list

Name: TargetSelection_Platform_ps5
Comment: the ps5 platform title in the platform selection list

Name: TargetSelection_Platform_Windows
Comment: the windows platform title in the platform selection list

Name: TargetSelection_Platform_xboxseriesxs
Comment: the Xbox One & Series X/S platform title in the platform selection list

Name: TargetSelection_Platform_Mac
Comment: the mac platform title in the platform selection list

Name: TargetSelection_Platform_ios
Comment: the apple iOS platform title in the platform selection list

Name: TargetSelection_Platform_tvos
Comment: the apple tvOS platform title in the platform selection list

Name: LanguageLoad_StartupError
English: Could not load language {0}. Check your ui.log for details
Translation: Could not load language {0}. Check your ui.log for details

Name: ProgressBar_Install
Comment: the progress bar caption while installing

Name: PluginWarning_AssemblyNotFoundError
English: Assembly not found for GMPluginAssembly {0}, path {1}
Translation: Assembly not found for GMPluginAssembly {0}, path {1}

Name: PluginWarning_ReferencedAssemblyNotFoundError
English: Referenced assembly {1} not found for GMPluginAssembly {0}
Translation: Referenced assembly {1} not found for GMPluginAssembly {0}

Name: PluginWarning_AssemblyNotSignedError
English: Assembly not signed for GMPluginAssembly {0}, path {1}
Translation: Assembly not signed for GMPluginAssembly {0}, path {1}

Name: PluginWarning_BadAssemblyError
English: Assembly {0} has an unspecified bad format
Translation: Assembly {0} has an unspecified bad format

Name: PluginWarning_BadPortableExecutableFormatError
English: Assembly {0} has a bad portable executable format
Translation: Assembly {0} has a bad portable executable format

Name: PluginWarning_BadCLRHeaderFormatError
English: Assembly {0} has a bad CLR header format
Translation: Assembly {0} has a bad CLR header format

Name: PluginWarning_FoundPluginError
English: {0} IPlugins with a matching name were found in {1} - there can only be one
Translation: {0} IPlugins with a matching name were found in {1} — there can only be one

Name: PluginWarning_InvalidLanguageFileWarning
English: Language pack {0} has an invalid format
Translation: Language pack {0} has an invalid format

Name: PluginWarning_LanguageFileNotFoundWarning
English: Language pack {0} could not be found
Translation: Language pack {0} could not be found

Name: PluginWarning_NullAssemblyLoadContextError
English: Assembly load context was null for GMPluginAssembly {0}
Translation: Assembly load context was null for GMPluginAssembly {0}

Name: PluginWarning_SymbolsFailedToLoadWarning
English: Symbols failed to load for assembly {0}
Translation: Symbols failed to load for assembly {0}

Name: UserLogin_RetrySSO
Comment: User Login — Error Retry SSO login

Name: UserLogin_NoRuntime
English: Unable to access the Runtime Feed and no local Runtime installed. Please check your internet connection and start GameMaker again.
Translation: Unable to access the Runtime Feed and no local Runtime installed. Please check your internet connection and start GameMaker again.

Name: UserLogin_RuntimeSpaceWarningMessage
English: Destination drive {0} has only {1} GB free space available.\nAt least 2 GB of free space is recommended - please ensure there is enough free space available before proceeding.
Translation: Destination drive {0} has only {1} GB free space available.\nAt least 2 GB of free space is recommended — please ensure there is enough free space available before proceeding.

Name: UserLogin_MaxDevice
English: Maximum sign ins exceeded \nYou can manage your account sessions at {0}
Translation: Maximum sign ins exceeded \nYou can manage your account sessions at {0}

Name: User_OK
Comment: User Login — two step authentication ok button

Name: runtime_onstartup_change
English: Do you want to change your current runtime to the matching IDE version {0}?
Translation: Do you want to change your current runtime to the matching IDE version {0}?
Comment: Change current runtime to the version matching the IDE

Name: opera_env_sso_confirm
English: You are using a custom environment for Opera GX settings. If you use Opera Single Sign-on, these settings will be overriden. Do you wish to proceed anyway?
Translation: You are using a custom environment for Opera GX settings. If you use Opera Single Sign-on, these settings will be overriden. Do you wish to proceed anyway?
Comment: Warning shown when a user tries to log-in via Opera SSO with a custom environment

Name: CodeSnippets_ConversionWarning
English: An old code snippets format was detected. Would you like to convert these to the new format?
Translation: An old code snippets format was detected. Would you like to convert these to the new format?

Name: runtime_dns_ResolvingFailed
Comment: A title of the warning which is shown when after the IDE failed to resolve an address against an alternative DNS

Name: runtime_dns_ResolvingFailedMessage
English: Could not resolve {0} with an alternative DNS. A system DNS has been used
Translation: Could not resolve {0} with an alternative DNS. A system DNS has been used
Comment: Could not use an alternative DNS

Name: ThemeError_MissingComma
English: Error in theme at '{0}', check all entries are separated with commas
Translation: Error in theme at '{0}', check all entries are separated with commas
